channel.title: First Click NPC

item.title: First Click NPC
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Does anyone know how to do first click NPC?

So like for my summoning npc’s

If(npcid == #### && attacknpc)
{
nodamagecounter();
delNPC();
}

Just showing you what i want it to do there. So it’ll be easier as attacking the npc so then you click like you’re gonna attack it and then I don’t want the number with the hitsplat to show up. Just the npc to be dismissed and maybe send the player a nice little message but i can do that lol…

Read full topic
